name: Piotr Sankowski
content: Piotr Sankowski | Homepage Piotr Sankowski Homepage Contact Publications Publications in CS Publications in Physics Homepage Homepage I am currently involved in the following actions: a professor at the Institute of Informatics, University of Warsaw – I currently interested in applied and economic aspects of algorithms, CEO of MIM Solutions – where we deploy ML solutions, the head of newly funded IDEAS NCBR center for Artificial Intelligence and Digital Economy – which is aimed to create new generation of innovators. I am the first Pole to receive three ERC grants: in 2017, ERC CoG project TUgbOAT, in 2015,  ERC PoC project PAAl-PoC, in 2010, ERC StG project PAAl. For news and events please check my linkedin page. You can see the blog of our group here: corner.mimuw.edu.pl Interest Group on Algorithmic Foundations of Information Technology Some years ago we have created a Interest Group on Algorithmic Foundations of Information Technology (IGAFIT) that aim to promote algorithms in Europe. It is an interesting page as it tries to collect all job posts in algorithms in Europe http://igafit.mimuw.edu.pl/?cat=22. Proudly powered by WordPress | Theme: Chunk by WordPress.com.
